ygData.subject: Re: Looting Robes, and other rants :P
ygData.msgSnippet: Well I will be willing to help you get a black robe if you help me ;-) we could each make a newbie . ..  and let the newbie die to get each other the robes!!!
ygData.messageBody:
Well I will be willing to help you get a black robe if you help me ;-)

we could each make a newbie . .. and let the newbie die to get each other
the robes!!! I play on Eci!!!! anyone want a black robe as well???

Mata 10th lvl High Elf Wizard (Eci)


----- Original Message -----
From: John Cuyle <johncuyle@...>
To: <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, April 22, 1999 9:08 PM
Subject: [eq_wizards] Re: Looting Robes, and other rants :P


> From: "John Cuyle" <johncuyle@...>
>
> Hey, that's a nifty idea. Thanks for posting it. So.. Who wants to get
me
> a black robe?
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: McCartney, Michael R <Michael.McCartney2@...>
> To: <eq_wizards@onelist.com>

> Subject: [eq_wizards] Re: Looting Robes, and other rants :P

be

it.

> >
> > *shrugs*
> >
> > Drev
> >
> > > ----------

take
> it from

> > > a dark elf would work. Just my two cents.
> > >
> > > Also as a newbie to the 8th level, should I get shock of ice or
> firebolt? I am
> > > am broke and saving to buy my first new spell. I actually have had
luck
> with
> > > parties and explain my role so they understand. Buffing the warriors
> with
> > > Okeils, does make them apprieciative too. Most like the fact that
> monsters get
> > > hurt when hitting them, fits right into the warrior ego/mentality of
> hurt,
> > > crush, bash, cut.
> > >
> > > Hey, I love the one line remarks but could you maybe just trim all the
> quote
> > > crap out except the last message you are one lining, I recently
switched
> to the
> > > digest version and 90% of that message is quoted spam and headers. Oh
> well it
> > > is better than trying to read 110 messages, when only halfway through
> the first
> > > you get 10 more. I really didn\'t care but took to long to read that
> way, easier
> > >
> > > in digest (after all I need to read these quick so I can play more
EQ).
> I am on
> > > 4 other EQ lists too :P still can\'t get enough.
> > >
> > > Anyway I am off on another journey.
> > >
> > > Zakrul The Traveler
> > > Companion
